IR.name: Taupe
IR.desc: No wonder we were so easily hacked. Our investigation revealed that one of our employees has been communicating with the hacker. However, without any proof, there is no way to take action. Find the secret message.

IR.name: cheval de troie
IR.desc:
After accessing our private network, the hacker skillfully maneuvered through files, leaving behind a virtual trail of mystery. We managed to capture the packets, exposing the encrypted breadcrumbs scattered across the network. Before slipping away into the digital abyss, the intruder left a deliberate hint—a cryptic message that conceals the essence of their next move. Decrypt the message and unveil the obscured 'crypto' to thwart their cunning plan.

Taupe will be visible after this challenge

IR.name: conqueror
IR.desc:
Our company is dealing with a possible case of corporate espionage. The credentials of one of our systems were changed and it was used to gain access to our internal network.

Help us gain access to the system before its too late.

Memory Dump Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/14MWp-UtVPAcu1hEyv1_xBhpdO3nIrEBo/view?usp=sharing


coup de réseau will be visible after solving this challenge.

IR.name: coup de r seau
IR.desc:
Too late. The network admin's system was compromised and we can't access our network anymore. Investigate the memory dump.

Memory Dump Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LbElkzno-FophYpkTLPL5ic2BnZgn-UN/view?usp=sharing

Amour Plastique will be visible after solving this challenge.

IR.name: coup de reseau
IR.desc:
Too late. The network admin's system was compromised and we can't access our network anymore. Investigate the memory dump.

Memory Dump Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LbElkzno-FophYpkTLPL5ic2BnZgn-UN/view?usp=sharing

Amour Plastique will be visible after solving this challenge.

crypto.name: Lost in the Spectrum
crypto.desc:
Can you find the flag among the noise?(a lone X is unknown )

Wrap flag in nite{ }

crypto.name: PARtly bintastic
crypto.desc:
crack your neck for the unimportant bits. mr.hamming might help out iykyk

Wrap flag in nite{}

crypto.name: Quantum Quandary
crypto.desc:
Authors: Definately_Not_A_Bot

Even Antman can't explain how to decrypt this by using the word 'quantum'

crypto.name: Solitaires are pretty
crypto.desc:
Panther is engaged in a game of cards, yet it seems that he has not utilized the entire deck.

Wrap flag in nite{}

crypto.name: Unraveling the Patterns
crypto.desc: You have intercepted a message from an encrypted communication channel, but it appears that the sender has implemented additional measures to safeguard the information. Are you able to decrypt it?

crypto.name: double whammy
crypto.desc: I need a new admin for my AES encryption service, but sigh, no one seems to make the cut :/

forensic.name: Matryoshka
forensic.desc:
: I think we should have a matryoshka challenge..

: Sure! Go ahead.

: Let's make it different this time. HEhe!

: *-+

forensic.name: Phantasmagoria
forensic.desc: Perchance, Professor Paranoid purposefully painted this puzzling picture to prompt his pupils. Perhaps, you can procure the passphrase.

forensic.name: i give up
forensic.desc:
John Doe, the admin of a very famous meme page, has been missing for quite a while. I was analysing the last video he was working on, but the frames I extracted are corrupted. I am sending the frames and audio to you; I give up.

Hint:- Do the frames actually lead to the flag, xor it's just another rickroll? Where's the key tho...

misc.name: DecryptaQuest
misc.desc:
Embark on a silent adventure between a web browser and server. No clues, just mystery. Good luck, detective of the unknown!

"Flag format : NITE{FLAG}"

misc.name: least ELOistic fish
misc.desc:
Authors: YouGuess, D3V4, aRacHn0!D

Welcome to Unfair Chess! You always get to play White, but there's a catch, a couple actually!

For every move you play, Black gets two! Stockfish plays against you!

Really straight forward, survive 50 moves, you win.

You can get your Italians ready by 1. e2e4 or play Queen's Gambit with 1. d2d4

I played 1. d2d4 then 2. c2c4 then 3. d1d4 and lost my Queen :'(

Good luck to you though!

misc.name: porters whistle
misc.desc: Tuition fees have gotten so pricey. Check out the email this mum's sent.

misc.name: where is porter
misc.desc: Porter has gone MIA. Yes there is some action happening. But right now we need to focus on finding her. The following evidence was found at one of the multiple condos she had rented. Can you figure out where she went?

pwn.name: ARMs race
pwn.desc: Note: You may use QEMU userspace emulation for testing your exploit but the way address spaces are created may cause issues.

pwn.name: ARMv8 NITE
pwn.desc: We are experimenting on a new extension of the ARMv8 spec! Introducing ARMv8-NITE with blazing fast registers to crush those benchmarks!

pwn.name: The road not taken
pwn.desc: Show me the right path to reach my final destination

rev.name: Minelogic
rev.desc: Like everyone in this world, John Doe has a lock and a key. He knows the 3 bit lock is 110 but he has lost all the 8 bit keys. Help him find all the keys.

rev.name: Top Secret
rev.desc: We were able to intercept a transmission signal to end up getting an image from an criminal firm and one of our spies was able to send us an program which was used to encrypt it but he was caught right after that and lost some part of it before he could send it can u help us decrypt the transmission.

rev.name: You Collide You lose I
rev.desc:
You find yourself in a strange 2D world and the only way to escape is by finding the flag hidden in your surroundings. Look in every nook and cranny for it and be very patient because even a small slip up lands you back at the beginning.

You Collide, You lose - II will be visible after solving this challenge.

rev.name: You Collide You lose II
rev.desc: Turns out one flag ain't gonna be enough. To get out, you need the secret code sung by the mystic P13t P1p3r whose ardent rings can forever be heard in an eerie corner of the world. Best of luck.

rev.name: Zealot
rev.desc: Follow the commandments and you shall be worthy enough to lift the sword of Zealot

web.name: Image Gallery
web.desc: View your photo gallery using our super Secure image gallery. we offer free 1 terabyte of storage of high-Quality images, showcased in a personalized custom aLbum.

web.name: Mini Survey
web.desc:
Please answer this survey for the better of all

- Minnesota Dept of Roads & Railways
